response.original_title: Desi on the Dancefloor: Women at the forefront of India’s underground music communities
response.overview: A documentary spotlighting the women driving India’s electronic music scene, where sound becomes a space for expression, spirituality, empowerment and defiance in a male-dominated culture.
response.title: Desi on the Dancefloor: Women at the forefront of India’s underground music communities
